page.title: 19BOYS FASHION.
page.content:
Boy of ten and eleven like to wear track suits, tee shirts, sweaters, shorts, white socks and trainers. Yellow and pink are the most fashionable colours at the moment. Most boys like to look casual and sporty. There are 2 main hairstyles for boys at the present. One is curly on top and short at the sides, the other is a fairly long fringe at the front with sideburns pushed behind the ears and long at the back. The boys in our school are as fashion conscious as the girls.
By Oscar Falconer. Aged 10.
